h1_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
h2_title: Erlang Shen Boss Fight and Guide
content: You should similarly approach the fight to the Four Heavenly Kings, and use Primal Punch to build up your Focus. When it's built up, use Earthshatter Slam to replenish your health and perform a heavy attack, and keep Rock Solid for moments when you can deflect Erlang Shen's blade attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Four_Heavenly_Kings_and_Erlang_Shen.md', within the main section titled 'The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang Shen Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
You should similarly approach the fight to the Four Heavenly Kings, and use Primal Punch to build up your Focus. When it's built up, use Earthshatter Slam to replenish your health and perform a heavy attack, and keep Rock Solid for moments when you can deflect Erlang Shen's blade attack.
